translate.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Translations
translate.description: Thank you to our translators who have made it possible for {{COM:bot.name}} to be used in the following languages. If you are interested in providing a translation, please contact the staff in our [support server]({{COM:links.support}}).

invite.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Invite
invite.description: Click [here]({{COM:links.invite}}) to invite {{COM:bot.name}} to a server!

docs.title: {{COM:bot.name}} - Documentation
docs.description: Click [here]({{COM:links.docs}}/) to view the bot documentation.

commandIntr.title: Registration
commandIntr.description: Check your Direct Messages -- I've sent you instructions for registering as {{IFC_USERNAME}}.

dmInstructions.title: Registration Verification Instructions
dmInstructions.description: To register as {{IFC_USERNAME}} please spawn in Infinite Flight following these conditions, and maintain that position until I notify you that our ground crew has verified you. You have {{STALE_MINUTES}} minutes until our groundcrew stop checking your aircraft. Once you are successfully verified, you'll never have to register again for any other server you join!

fields.name: True Heading
fields.value: {{TRUE_HEADING}} degrees. Be sure that this is your TRUE heading, usually the compass in your HUD is your magnetic heading. Configure the status bar on your lower screen to display TRUE heading - https://infiniteflight.com/guide/getting-started-guide/pilot-user-interface/status-bar.

verified.title: Registration Verified
verified.description: Awesome, our groundcrew have checked your aircraft. You are now verified to fly as {{IFC_USERNAME}} on Infinite Flight! I'll remember your registration for all servers you join -- no need to register again unless you decide to change your Infinite Flight or Discord account.

unsuccessfullVerification.title: Something is wrong
unsuccessfullVerification.description: Our groundcrew see your aircraft, but something is off. Not to worry, our groundcrew will come back every minute to check again. They'll keep checking until after {{STALE_MINUTES}} minutes from when you submitted your registration -- no need to register again until after that {{STALE_MINUTES}} minutes. Please check the instructions we originally sent you and check below for common mistakes:

fields.name: Server
fields.value: Be sure that you are in the Casual Server

fields.name: True Heading
fields.value: Use the TRUE HEADING when adjusting your aircraft. You can find this in the Status Bar at the bottom of your screen -- toggle the option box to choose 'True Heading' https://infiniteflight.com/guide/getting-started-guide/pilot-user-interface/status-bar

fields.name: Our fault
fields.value: Sometimes our groundcrew check too early when you are still adjusting your aircraft. If you believe you have followed the instructions, do not worry. Just stay still and wait for our groundcrew to check again -- that should be within a minute from now.

subscribed.title: Subscribed!
subscribed.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> will now receive notifications for active pilots on Infinite Flight. A notification is only sent when a user who can view the channel is sitting in a cockpit on Infinite Flight.

alreadySubscribed.title: Channel is already subscribed
alreadySubscribed.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> is already subscribed to active pilot notifications

invalidChannel.title: Invalid Channel
invalidChannel.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> is not a valid channel. The channel must be a text channel.

cannotViewChannel.title: Cannot View Channel
cannotViewChannel.description: I don't have permission to view <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. Please make sure I have the permissions to view <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>, or choose a different channel.

cannotSendMessages.title: Cannot Send Messages
cannotSendMessages.description: I don't have permission to send messages in <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. Please make sure I have the permissions to send messages in <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>, or choose a different channel.

success.title: Notifications Disabled for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}}
success.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> will no longer receive notifications for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} on Infinite Flight.

notEnabled.title: Notifications were Already Disabled for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}}
notEnabled.description: I did not need to disable {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} notifications for <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> was not subscribed to notifications for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} on Infinite Flight.

invalidChannel.title: Invalid Channel
invalidChannel.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> is not a valid channel. The channel must be a text channel.

cannotViewChannel.title: Cannot View Channel
cannotViewChannel.description: I don't have permission to view <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. Please make sure I have the permissions to view <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>, or choose a different channel.

cannotSendMessages.title: Cannot Send Messages
cannotSendMessages.description: I don't have permission to send messages in <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. Please make sure I have the permissions to send messages in <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>, or choose a different channel.

success.title: {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} Enabled
success.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> will now receive notifications for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} on Infinite Flight.

successAll.title: All Notifications Enabled
successAll.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> will now receive notifications for {{NOTIFICATION_TYPES}} on Infinite Flight. Any other notifications I didn't just mention were already enabled.

alreadyEnabled.title: {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} were Already Enabled
alreadyEnabled.description: I did not need to enable {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} notifications for <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}>. <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> was already subscribed to {{NOTIFICATION_TYPE}} on Infinite Flight.

invalidChannel.description: <#{{CHANNEL_ID}}> is not a valid channel. The channel must be a text channel.

activePilot.title: Pilot {{GUILD_DISPLAY_NAME}} is now online as {{IFC_USERNAME}}!
activePilot.description: <@{{DISCORD_ID}}> ({{IFC_USERNAME}}) is piloting a {{AIRCRAFT_NAME}} on Infinite Flight

devOnlyCommand.description: This command can only be used by developers.

serverOnlyCommand.description: This command can only be used in a server.

permissionRequired.description: You don't have permission to run that command!

registerMeIFCUsernameNotSpecified.title: Specify ifc-username
registerMeIFCUsernameNotSpecified.description: Please specify your Infinite Flight Community username.

registerMeuserHadFreshVerificationTicket.description: You recently requested to register. To prevent abuse, please wait {{STALE_MINUTES}} minutes from your last request before requesting again.

registerMeIFCUsernameNotFound.title: Username Not Found
registerMeIFCUsernameNotFound.description: So I looked through all the pilot records and found that the Infinite Flight Community Username, {{IFC_USERNAME}}, does not exist. Please double check spelling and ensure this is the correct username.

registerMeIFCUsernameTaken.title: Username Already Registered
registerMeIFCUsernameTaken.description: My records show that the Infinite Flight Community Username, {{IFC_USERNAME}}, is already registered by either you or another pilot.

startupInProcess.description: {{COM:bot.name}} is still starting up. Try again later.

bot.description: [Skylink-IF]({{COM:links.website}}) brings Infinite Flight to discord. See your friend's stats and get notifications when server members are online! Encourage your friends to use **/register-me** to get the most value out of Skylink-IF.

commandDescs.help: View help menu and list of commands.
commandDescs.registerMe: Register your Infinite Flight account! This is very important to make Infinite Flight more integrated for you and your server.
commandDescs.link: Get links to invite, support, etc.
commandDescs.enableNotifications: Enable ATC or Pilot notifications a channel.

missingEmbedPerms: I don't have all permissions required to send messages here!
Please allow me to **View Channel**, **Send Messages**, and **Embed Links** in this channel.
